pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partial Least Squares Path Modeling (PLS-PM) // Partial Least Squares Path Modeling (PLS-PM), Tenenhaus, Esposito Vinzi, Chatelin, Lauro (2005) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2004.03.005, analysis for both metric and non-metric data, as well as REBUS analysis, Esposito Vinzi, Trinchera, Squillacciotti, and Tenenhaus (2008) doi:10.1002/asmb.728.
